verses.1: Hih thu teng khit ciangin Persia kumpi Artakzaksis uk hun sungin Ezra, a pa Seraiah, a pa Azariah, a pa Hikiah,
verses.2: a pa Shalum, a pa Zadok, a pa Ahitub,
verses.3: a pa Amariah, a pa Azariah, a pa Meraioth,
verses.4: a pa Zerahiah, a pa Uzzi, a pa Bukki,
verses.5: a pa Abishua, a pa Finehas, a pa Eleazar, a pa siampi lianpen pa Aaron:
verses.6: hih Ezra pen Babylon panin hong tung to hi. Amah pen Israel Pasian, Topa in a piak Moses thukham a siam lai thei mi khat ahi hi. Topa ahi ama Pasian in ompih ahih manin ama nget khempeuh kumpipa in a pia hi.
verses.7: Kumpi Artakzaksis in a uk a kum sagihna kumin Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, lasate, kongcingte le biakinn nasem pawl khat zong, Jerusalem ah Ezra tawh tung to uh hi.
verses.8: Kumpipaʼ uk kum sagih a cin kum, a kha ngana sungin Jerusalem tung uh hi.
verses.9: A kha masa a ni khat ni-in Babylon pan a ding khia dingin Ezra in a ni sehkhol a, a kha ngana a ni khat ni-in Jerusalem a tung uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in amah ompih hi.
verses.10: Bang hang hiam cih leh Ezra in Topaʼ thukham sinin zuih ding le Israel mite a hilh dingin amah kipia hi.
verses.11: Kumpi Artakzaksis in siampi ahi, lai thei pa lah ahi, Israel-te adingin Topaʼ thupiaknate le thukhamte a siam Ezra tungah a piak lai pen hih bang ahi hi:
verses.12: “Kumpiteʼ kumpi ahi Artakzaksis kiang panin vantung Pasianʼ thukham a siam, siampi hi-in lai thei pa lah ahi Ezra tungah:
verses.13: “Ka lungsim khensatna hih bang ahi hi: Ka gam sunga om Israel mi khatpeuh ahi a, a siampite uh ahi a, Levi mite ahi zongin, Jerusalem ah a ciahkik nuam khempeuh in nang hong zuih theih nadingun thu ka pia hi.
verses.14: Nang tungah hong kipia ahi na Pasianʼ thukham tawh kisai-in Judah le Jerusalem ah thu bangci om hiam cih a va thei dingin kumpipa keimah le thu hong lamlak mihing sagihte in kong sawl uh hi.
verses.15: Kumpipa le a thulamlakte in Jerusalem ah a teeng Israel Pasian tungah lungkim takin a piak ngun le khamte zong,
verses.16: Babylon gamah na muh uh ngun le khamte le Jerusalem-a noteʼ Pasianʼ biakinn dingin mite le siampite in lungkim takin a piakkhiat zuazuate uh tawh a va puakkhawm ding na hi uh hi.
verses.17: “Hih ka thupiakna tawh kizui-in hih sumte pen Jerusalem-a noteʼ Pasianʼ biakinn-a biakna tau tungah piak dingin bawngtalte, tuutalte, tuunote le a an tawh biaknate le a leenggahzu tawh biakna dingte lei nading bekin na zang ding uh hi.
verses.18: Tua banah ngun le kham a val a om lai leh, noteʼ Pasianʼ deihna tawh kituakin hoih na sak bangun na lawmte tawh na zang thei ding uh hi.
verses.19: Na Pasianʼ biakinn ah zat dingin hong kipia umlebeelte pen Jerusalem Pasian tungah na va pia ding hi.
verses.20: Na Pasianʼ biakinn adingin a kisam, na piak ding a phamawh a om khak zenzen leh kumpipa sum sung panin na zang thei ding hi.
verses.21: “Tua hi a, kumpipa keimah Artakzaksis in Eufratis Gun gal gam sunga om kumpi vankemte khempeuh tungah hih bangin thu ka pia hi: Vantung Pasianʼ thukham a siam lai a thei, siampi Ezra in note tung panin a kisapna hong nget ciangin,
verses.22: ngun talen za khat, mangbuh seu za khat, leenggahzu tambong za nih, sathau tambong za nih ciang le ci a deih zahzah na pia ding uh hi.
verses.23: Vantung Pasian in a deih peuhpeuh, vantung Pasian biakinn adingin limtakin hih un. Tua hikeileh kumpipa tapate le kumpi gam tungah amah hong heh kha ding hi.
verses.24: Siampite, Levi mite, lasate, kongcingte, biakinn nasemte, ahih kei leh hih Pasianʼ biakinn-a nasemte khat peuhpeuh tung panin siah ahi a, mangmu ahi a, losap ahi zongin lak nading thu na neih lohna uh zong kong zasak uh hi, ka ci hi.
verses.25: “Tua hi a, nang Ezra in nang tungah hong kipia na Pasianʼ pilna tawh kizui-in Eufratis Gun gal gam sunga mite thu a khen dingin na Pasianʼ thukham a thei mite seh in. Nang le amaute in na Pasianʼ thukham a thei lote na hilh ding uh hi.
verses.26: Na Pasianʼ thukham le kumpipaʼ thukham a mang lo peuhmah, sihna ahi a, hawl khiatna ahi a, neihsa matna ahi a, thongkiatna ahi zongin, a ngah ding a kilawm thukhenna tawh khauh takin gim kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.27: Tua ciangin Ezra in, “Jerusalem-a om Topaʼ biakinn tua bangin a min thangsak thuah dingin kumpipa lungsimah suak a, kumpipa le a thulamlakte le a uliante kei tungah a thunuam dingin a bawl i pu i pateʼ Pasian ahi Topa in thupha ngah tahen!” a ci hi. Tua hi a, Topa ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna thei ka hih manin ka lungsim hong hang a, kei hong zui dingin Israel makaite ka khawm hi.
